metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5625 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A regression was introduced in the Red Hat build of python-eventlet due to a change in the patch application strategy, resulting in a patch for CVE-2021-21419 not being applied for all builds of all products.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is a Red Hat specific build issue, Ubuntu is not affected

criterions.comment: python-eventlet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
